title: pkg_resources.ContextualVersionConflict
body:
In GitLab by @olgabot on Nov 17, 2016, 08:05

Thanks for `flake8`, it's awesome! Keeps me in check when I'm changing too many things at once. I installed `flake8` using `pip` in this [Travis-CI](https://travis-ci.org/YeoLab/outrigger/jobs/175885323), using `pip install -r requirements.txt` and `flake8` is one of the requirements.

Oddly enough, all my tests run and my `make lint`, where the `lint` directive is below script passes, but ...

```make
lint:
	flake8 --exclude outrigger/external,doc outrigger
```

I also have a sanity check test to run my program on the command line and this is where the error occurs:

```
$ make lint
flake8 --exclude outrigger/external,doc outrigger
The command "make lint" exited with 0.
$ make arabdopsis
rm -rf *outrigger_output
outrigger index \
		--sj-out-tab outrigger/tests/data/arabdopsis/unprocessed/rna.chr4.subset.SJ.out.tab \
		--gtf outrigger/tests/data/arabdopsis/unprocessed/Arabidopsis_thaliana.TAIR10.31.chr4.subset.gtf \
		--min-reads 1 --n-jobs -1 \
		--output arabdopsis_outrigger_output
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/bin/outrigger", line 6, in <module>
    from pkg_resources import load_entry_point
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py2.7.egg/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2985, in <module>
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py2.7.egg/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2971, in _call_aside
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py2.7.egg/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 2998, in _initialize_master_working_set
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py2.7.egg/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 662, in _build_master
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py2.7.egg/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 675, in _build_from_requirements
  File "/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages/setuptools-27.2.0-py2.7.egg/pkg_resources/__init__.py", line 859, in resolve
pkg_resources.ContextualVersionConflict: (pyflakes 1.3.0 (/home/travis/miniconda/envs/testenv/lib/python2.7/site-packages), Requirement.parse('pyflakes<1.1,>=0.8.1'), set(['flake8']))
make: *** [arabdopsis] Error 1
```

I don't expect any `flake8` error when I run this code because `flake8` isn't imported anywhere in my program. I only use it on the command line for lint checking. Do you think something could be happening because `make lint` occurs right before `make arabdopsis`?

Thank you!
Olga
